column5: HAHAHA! I KNEW THIS DAY WOULD COME!
(Where did this fish come from?! Did he just jump over this huge fence?)
You will rue the day you came across the Great Neptunium, General of Externally Mutated Animal Army!
All you Internally Mutated Animal scum are the same, trying to invade our land for your devious schemes!
I wonâ€™t let you pass! En garde!
